sentences.sContent: His father and grandfather were craftsmen and he took a master’s degree in design at Musashino Art University in Tokyo.
sentences.sCn: 他的父亲和祖父都是工匠，他在东京的武藏野艺术大学获得设计硕士学位。

sentences.sContent: Today, he designs information systems for Booz Allen, studies toward a master’s degree in business, and dreams of someday being his own boss.
sentences.sCn: 如今，他在公司从事信息系统设计，并同时攻读工商管理硕士学位。 他的理想是有一天能拥有自己的公司。

sentences.sContent: My friend Linda, a successful woman with three children and a master’s degree in education, refuses to wear socks with her tennis shoes every time her mother comes to visit.
sentences.sCn: 我的朋友琳达是个成功女性，她拥有教育专业硕士学位，有三个孩子。 每次她妈妈来看她时，她都会不穿袜子直接穿网球鞋。
